docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Setup Guide This is the step-by-step guide on building software on Ubuntu. Prerequisites This software depends on Qt5 and OpenCV. Install these by running sudo apt-get install qtbase5-dev qtdeclarative5-dev libqt5webkit5-dev libsqlite3-dev sudo apt-get install qt5-default qttools5-dev-tools To install OpenCV , run: sudo apt-get install build-essential sudo apt-get install cmake git libgtk2.0-dev pkg-config libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev sudo apt-get install libopencv-dev Build To build the software, navigate to the root of the directory and run qmake src/Magnifier.pro make To execute the program: ./Magnifier
docs.title: Step-by-step Setup Instructions

Install these by running sudo apt-get install qtbase5-dev qtdeclarative5-dev libqt5webkit5-dev libsqlite3-dev sudo apt-get install qt5-default qttools5-dev-tools To install OpenCV , run: sudo apt-get install build-essential sudo apt-get install cmake git libgtk2.0-dev pkg-config libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev sudo apt-get install libopencv-dev
